fields.name: Treasure Island
fields.description: Sail out to an island in the ocean in search of pirate's treasure. This is a small, simple adventure suitable for younger folks or novice characters.
fields.intro_text:
You found an old map in a pirate's treasure chest. There was a note on the map saying that there were a lot of treasures on an island in the ocean.

You thought you could use some more money, so you found a boat and went sailing out to look for the island. By following the map, you found it. It is a very small island, so it should be easy to find the treasures.

You pull your boat up on a small sandy beach, get out, and start looking.

fields.name: On the beach (n/s/e)
fields.description: You are on a beach on the island. Your boat is just south of here. You can go north or east.

fields.name: At the end of the sandy passage (s/w)
fields.description: You are at the end of the sandy passage. There is a room to the west and you can also go south.

fields.name: At the end of the sandy tunnel (s)
fields.description: You have reached the end of the sandy tunnel.

fields.name: In a prison cell (s)
fields.description: This room is prison cell where the trolls lock up their prisoners.

fields.name: In a prison cell (s)
fields.description: You are in a cell where the trolls lock their prisoners. It is dirty, dark, and damp.

fields.name: In the gold room (e)
fields.description: This room is where the dragon kept his gold treasures. There are shelves on the wall to hold everything.

fields.name: In a sandy passage (n/s/w)
fields.description: The sandy passage you are in goes north and south. There is a room to the west.

fields.name: In a sandy tunnel (n/s)
fields.description: You are in a sandy tunnel going north and south.

fields.name: In the guard's room (n/s/e)
fields.description: This room is where the guard for the trolls' prison stays. The room is dirty and dark.

fields.name: In the trolls' weapon room (n/w)
fields.description: This is the room where the trolls store their weapons.

fields.name: In the pearl room (e)
fields.description: The dragon has decorated this room with all the pearls in his treasure.

fields.name: In a sandy room (n/e/w)
fields.description: You are in a large sandy room. It lookslike you are the first person ever to walk in here. There are tunnels to the north, east, and west.

fields.name: In a scorched room (n/s/w)
fields.description: The walls of this room are scorched. The roof is high and the floor is sandy and dry. You can go north, south, or west.

fields.name: In a rocky tunnel (n/s)
fields.description: You are in a rocky tunnel going north and south.

fields.name: In a closet (s)
fields.description: You are in an closet. There is nothing stored here now.

fields.name: At the end of the damp tunnel (s)
fields.description: You have reached the end of the damp tunnel. You can only go south.

fields.name: In a smooth tunnel (s/e)
fields.description: This is a very smooth tunnel. It bends from south to east.

fields.name: At the cave entrance (n/s/e/w/u)
fields.description: You are in the entrance of the cave. There is a ladder going up. There are dark tunnels in all four directions.

fields.name: In a dirty, rocky room (n/e/w)
fields.description: You are in a dirty room with a rocky floor. There are tunnels going north, east, and west.

fields.name: In a hallway (n/s/w)
fields.description: You are in a hallway. There is a room to the north and the hallway goes south. You can also go west.

fields.name: In a low damp room (n/s)
fields.description: The damp tunnel gets wider here but the roof is still low. There are spider webs hanging on the walls.

fields.name: At the end of the smooth tunnel (n)
fields.description: The smooth tunnel ends here. The only way out is north.

fields.name: In a damp tunnel (n/s)
fields.description: This tunnel is dark and damp. The flooris soft and you can see all kinds of footprints. None of them are coming out.

fields.name: In the trolls' bunkroom (e)
fields.description: This is where the trolls sleep. The room is a mess.

fields.name: In a hallway (n/s/w)
fields.description: You are in a hallway. There is a room to the south and another to the west. The hallway goes north.

fields.name: At a bend in a damp tunnel (n/e)
fields.description: The damp tunnel bends north and the roof gets lower. You can also go east.

fields.name: In a damp tunnel (e/w)
fields.description: The tunnel is still damp here. There are a few footprints on the floor, all going west. You can also go east.

fields.name: In a room with spiderwebs (n/e/w)
fields.description: Big spiderwebs hang from the ceiling of this room. The floor is damp. There are small tunnels going east and west and you can also go north.

fields.name: At a damp dead end (w)
fields.description: The damp tunnel comes to a dead end and you can only go west.

fields.name: In the trolls' vault (n)
fields.description: You have found the trolls' treasure vault. All their loot is stored here.

fields.name: In the jewel room (e)
fields.description: This is the room where the dragon kept all the jewels he found.

fields.name: On a rocky hill by the beach (s/e)
fields.description: You are on a rocky hill. You can go east to the top of the hill or south to the beach.

fields.name: On top of the hill by the cave (s/w/d)
fields.description: You are on top of the hill. There is a hole in the ground with a ladder going down. It looks like a cave. You can also go south or west down the hill.

fields.name: On a rocky hill by the beach (n/w)
fields.description: You are on a rocky hill. The beach is west of here and if you go north you will be on top of the hill.

fields.name: flashlight
fields.description: You see a flashlight, partly hidden by a rock.

fields.name: silver key
fields.description: There is a little silver key here that someone must have dropped.

fields.name: iron gate
fields.description: A gate with strong iron bars blocks the tunnel to the west.

fields.name: skeletons
fields.description: There are a lot of skeletons here, from the people eaten by the spider.

fields.name: gold ring
fields.description: A pretty gold ring is partly hidden under the skeletons.

fields.name: skeletons
fields.description: There are a few skeletons on the floor.

fields.name: wizard's hat
fields.description: There is a funny-looking wizard's hat on the floor.

fields.name: note
fields.description: A piece of note paper is next to the hat.

fields.name: wooden chest
fields.description: A large wooden chest sits by the wall.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: There is a pile of gold coins inside the chest.

fields.name: silver dollars
fields.description: There are 10 silver dollars lying in the sand.

fields.name: pearls
fields.description: There are strings of pearls hanging from the walls.

fields.name: magic potion
fields.description: There is a bottle of magic potion by some of the bones.

fields.name: gold necklace
fields.description: There is a gold necklace here.

fields.name: gold jewelry
fields.description: There is a pile of gold jewelry here.

fields.name: jewels
fields.description: There is a big pile of jewels heaped up on the floor. You see diamonds, rubies, and emeralds.

fields.name: Tom's knife
fields.description: You see Tom's knife. It is long and sharp.

fields.name: spiked club
fields.description: You see the troll's club. It has sharp spikes on it.

fields.name: iron key
fields.description: You see a rusty iron key. The guard must have dropped it.

fields.name: wooden door
fields.description: There is a wooden door in the north wall.

fields.name: wooden door
fields.description: There is a wooden door in the north wall.

fields.name: battle axe
fields.description: You see the troll's battle axe. It is very sharp.

fields.name: short sword
fields.description: You see a rather dull short sword.

fields.name: rusty spear
fields.description: You see a spear. It is rusty but still can be used.

fields.name: rusty axe
fields.description: You see an axe. It is rusty and dull but you could still use it.

fields.name: longbow
fields.description: You see a longbow. It is in very good shape.

fields.name: silver spear
fields.description: You see Helen's spear. It is long and sharp and decorated with silver.

fields.name: steel door
fields.description: There is a steel door blocking the way south.

fields.name: iron mace
fields.description: The troll has dropped a mean-looking iron mace.

fields.name: bill's sword
fields.description: You see Bill's sword. It is rather short but very sharp.

fields.name: trolls' treasure
fields.description: You see the trolls' treasure. Lots of gold, jewels, money, and other stuff all piled in a messy heap.

fields.text: To get rid of dragons:  Wear the hat and say 'DRAGON VANISH' three times where the dragon can hear you.
The man and the troll are fighting. The man sees you and shouts 'Help me please. My friends are trapped in the cave!'
The dragon seems puzzled and looks around the room.
The dragon looks around the room carefully. He seems to be irritated.
The dragon looks right at you. He sees the hat and tries to scorch you with his breath. Suddenly he vanishes into thin air.

fields.name: Tom
fields.description: You see a short, tough man. He would be a good person to have with you in a fight.

fields.name: Dick
fields.description: You see a tall man. He was one of the trolls' prisoners. He looks tired.

fields.name: Harry
fields.description: You see a big man. The trolls locked him up and now he is mad!

fields.name: Helen
fields.description: You see a woman, dressed in chain mail. She says she is hiding from the trolls and she came here to find her friends.

fields.name: Bill
fields.description: You see a tall strong man. He says he is looking for his friends who were captured by the trolls.

fields.name: rat
fields.description: There are a lot of rats here, great big ones. They are not friendly.

fields.name: big spider
fields.description: A big spider (big enough to eat you) is working on a web over the north tunnel. She drops down on you as soon as you walk in.

fields.name: spider
fields.description: Two spiders pounce on you as you enter the room.

fields.name: dragon
fields.description: A huge dragon almost fills up the room. Smoke comes from his mouth as he breathes. He could pick you up in one claw if he were awake but luckily he is asleep.

fields.name: troll
fields.description: There is a huge troll. He is the meanest-looking troll you have ever seen anywhere. He is carrying a club with spikes on it.

fields.name: troll guard
fields.description: There is a troll on guard here. He is holding a big axe and he is not happy to see you.

fields.name: troll guard
fields.description: There is a troll here, guarding the door. He jumps up when he sees you and waves his iron mace.

fields.question: How do I get past the sleeping dragon?

fields.answer: You can't fight him; he's too powerful. But there is a way, if you look around for certain magic items.
Look for the wizard hat and read the note that comes with it. It's behind a locked door, so you'll also need to find the right key.
